$comment: All sensitive values (e.g. passwords, proxy URLs) are encrypted

vrfData.$comment: All ControlPlane VLANs will be part of Foundation VRF

networkConnections.$comment: GL Metal needs to reserve three consecutive IP addresses from 'Out of Band Management(OOBM) Network', These IP addresses are not shown in SmartCID GUI, when Network ID and mask are changed SmartCID code should automatically update these reserved consecetive IP addresses

ipAddressPools.$comment: This data is added for CP automation and maintained by CP

networks.name: Foundation Services External Network
networks.$comment: minimum networkmask 255.255.255.0 or greater required. outboundGateway is customer's gateway/firewall for outbound internet access.

ipAddressPools.$comment: This data is for Metal owned/reserved IP range within FS External subnet.

specificAttributes.$comment: value of proxy URL willbe encrypted using SOPS with AWS KMS Key

networks.name: GL Metal Telemetry
networks.$comment: Network for GL Metal collection of telemetry data from deployed instances for purposes of SLA

solutionNetworkSettings.$comment: SmartCID backend automatically copies Control Plane DRBD cluster virtual IP as IP address for DNS and NTP here. SmartCID will replace with Squid Cluster LAN CARP Virtual IPAddress for proxy here. SmartCID backend copies Control Plane ipAddress for networkConnection purpose==Management Server Management for each CP server for cpNativeHostOs entries here. SmartCID backend copies Control Plane infrastructureManagement -> applications where name==MetalLB -> specificAttributes -> startExternalIPAddress & endExternalIPAddress for cpMetalLB entries here..
